items.text: slips this full delivery down leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Duminy, 1 wide

items.text: chops this forceful cur past the keeper, to short third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: miscue but this lands safely, bounces away towards square third man and hey come back for the second
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, 2 runs

items.text: he's clobbered this over long-on! Length ball, picked it early, held his shape and walloped it when it arrived.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, SIX runs

items.text: width and he's crashed this behind point, tracer bullet stuff. Is there another twist to the game? Rassie is on the move.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, FOUR runs

items.text: squeezes this drive to mid-off for a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: drifting into middle and leg, he works this to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: chipped over the infield to sweeper cover, excellent running
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, 2 runs

items.text: steps out and lunges forward a little more as he smothers this.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, no run

items.text: swept from outside off, dragged to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: gentle nudge wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: gets well forward and dabs it into the off side, looks for a single but is sent back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Duminy, no run

items.preText: Taimur Ejaz: "Who is this van dur dussen guy, he always rescue SA in crucial situations, like he did against Pak in last series. -- This is a good reference point. My colleague Deiva Muthu met him not too long ago for a lovely feature. Saifuddin is back
items.text: oh, dear. Oh, dear. Accuse me of jinxing or whatever later. Got to say this was a poor shot. Looks for an ugly hoick across the line but misses it all together. Saifuddin went full, went straight and found timber.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to van der Dussen, OUT

dismissal.text: HE van der Dussen  b Mohammad Saifuddin 41 (61m 38b 2x4 1x6) SR: 107.89

items.preText: And if you've just returned from a Sunday night movie, WATCH - #SAvBAN LIVE on Hotstar (Available to viewers in India only)
items.text: gentle dab from the crease to the off side.
items.postText: Isam pings from the open air press box at The Oval: "We are sitting in the overflow press box seating area, right next to the crowd. Just before Saifuddin's delivery, one guy just said: "come on Saifuddin, this is your do-or-die over"
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Phehlukwayo, no run

items.text: chops this to point, looking for width when there was none
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Phehlukwayo, no run

items.text: nice and full on the stumps, defends this into the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Phehlukwayo, no run

items.text: hint of reverse away as he attacks the stumps with a full delivery, defended.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Phehlukwayo, no run

items.text: uppish, but lands short of mid-off. Maiden over, top over
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Phehlukwayo, no run

items.preText: Avnish Anshu: "It is situations like these that make me understand why AB Devilliers said he would play MSD even if he was in a wheelchair. SA need a guy who can soak pressure and deliver in crunch situations like these, and there is just no one."
items.text: punches this to deep point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: carved away, into the gap. This is a top shot, stood still, deep in the crease to belt this half-volley to the cover boundary
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Phehlukwayo, FOUR runs

items.preText: Mashrafe to bowl from over the wicket
items.text: pulled to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Phehlukwayo, 1 run

items.text: squeezes this drive into the gap at deep cover for another two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Duminy, 2 runs

items.text: whippy pull down to deep backward square, good stop
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Duminy, 1 run

items.text: toe-ends the drive to long-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Phehlukwayo, 1 run

items.preText: Right, what's the best place to party in Dhanmondi, folks? Good time to start the celebration? How are you folks in Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet or elsewhere following this? What's the mood like?
items.text: steps out and hits this straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Phehlukwayo, no run
